1406650.name: Fantasy Grounds - Aquatic Menace 2!
1406650.description:
Aquatic Menace 2!

This Token Pack contains some uncommon aquatic creatures to be used in your Adventures.
Included Tokens with color/weapon variations.

This product includes:
  • anemone_green
  • anemone_orange
  • anemone_pink
  • Banner
  • crab_brown
  • crab_orange
  • crab_purple
  • crab_spiked_brown
  • crab_spiked_orange
  • crab_spiked_purple
  • dolphin_grey
  • dolphin_masked
  • dolphin_white
  • Jellyfish_Crimson
  • Jellyfish_Deathshead
  • Jellyfish_Heatsapper
  • Jellyfish_Luminous
  • Jellyfish_Saphire
  • Jellyfish_Sicklygreen
  • Lobster_Deep
  • Lobster_Sand
  • Lobster_Shore
  • Manta_ray
  • Manta_ray_White
  • octopus_blue
  • octopus_pink
  • octopus_red
  • pufferfish_blue
  • pufferfish_brown
  • pufferfish_puff_blue
  • pufferfish_puff_brown
  • pufferfish_puff_yellow
  • pufferfish_yellow
  • Reefclaw_Coast
  • Reefclaw_Pond
  • Reefclaw_River
  • sea_scorpion_blue
  • sea_scorpion_orange
  • sea_scorpion_yellow
  • Sea_turtle_blue
  • Sea_turtle_gliding_blue
  • Sea_turtle_gliding_green
  • Sea_turtle_gliding_jade
  • Sea_turtle_green
  • Sea_turtle_turquoise
  • seal_blue

Adapted for Fantasy Grounds by:
Kevin Doswell
Requires: The free Fantasy Grounds virtual tabletop (VTT) software and any ruleset. Compatible with Fantasy Grounds Unity
